impacts: In birds, it has resulted in millions of infections in commercial poultry and backyard flocks, with many culled. Some mammals have also been infected.
impacts_business: Over 60 million commercial poultry and backyard bird flocks have been killed or culled since 2022 due to the outbreak, impacting the poultry business.
top_article: Virologist offers perspective on avian influenza outbreak

impacts: School and office closures, travel restrictions, increased hospital admissions
impacts_business: Reduced productivity and consumption due to illness and restrictions
top_article: Rajasthan: 12 Die of Swine Flu, 945 Cases Recorded Since Jan
